02181     /* Update the Global Variable */
02182     SDMMC004_Handle.CommandInterruptError = SDMMC004_COMMAND_ENDBIT_ERROR;
02183     /* Change the Command Line Status to free */
02184     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_CMD_ACTIVE;
02185     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02186     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_END_BIT_ERR_Msk;
02187     /* Release the Semaphore */
02188     Status =osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId);
02189   }
02190   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_4>>> */
02191   /* COMMAND INDEX ERROR INTERRUPT */
02192   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_IND_ERR_Msk ) != 0)
02193   {
02194     /* Update the Global Variable */
02195     SDMMC004_Handle.CommandInterruptError = SDMMC004_COMMAND_INDEX_ERROR;
02196     /* Change the Command Line Status to free */
02197     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_CMD_ACTIVE;
02198 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02199     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseEndError == TRUE)
02200     {
02201       /* Forcefully disable the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02202       SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0000 ;
02203     }
02204     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseStartError == TRUE)
02205     {
02206       /* Forcefully disable the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02207       SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0000 ;
02208     }
02209 #endif  /*SDMMC_UVP_TEST*/
02210     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02211     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_IND_ERR_Msk;
02212     /* Release the Semaphore */
02213     Status =osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId);
02214   }
02215   
02216   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_5>>> */
02217   /* DATA TIMEOUT ERROR INTERRUPT */
02218   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_TIMEOUT_ERR_Msk) != 0)
02219   {
02220     /* Update the Global Variable */
02221     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_DATA_TIMEOUT_ERROR;
02222     /* Change the Data line to free  */
02223     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_DATA_ACTIVE;
02224     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02225     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_TIMEOUT_ERR_Msk;
02226     /* Release the Semaphore */
02227     Status = osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId);
02228   }
02229   
02230   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_6>>> */
02231   /* DATA CRC ERROR INTERRUPT  */
02232   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_CRC_ERR_Msk) != 0)
02233   {
02234     /* Update the Global Variable */
02235     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_DATA_CRC_ERROR;
02236     /* Change the Data line to free  */
02237     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_DATA_ACTIVE;
02238 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02239     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_DataErrorInterrupt == TRUE)
02240     {
02241       /* Forcefully trigger the Data Crc Error Interrupt */
02242       SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0000 ;
02243       /* Enable the Buffer Ready Status Interrupt */
02244       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM |= SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_BUFF_READ_READY_EN_Msk;
02245       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM |= SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_BUFF_READ_READY_EN_Msk;
02246 
02247       /* Enable the Buffer Ready Status Interrupt */
02248       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM |= SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_BUFF_WRITE_READY_EN_Msk;
02249       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM |= SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_BUFF_WRITE_READY_EN_Msk;
02250     }
02251 #endif
02252     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02253     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_CRC_ERR_Msk;
02254     /* Release the Semaphore */
02255     Status = osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId);
02256   }
02257   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_7>>> */
02258   /*DATA END BIT ERROR INTERRUPT */
02259   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_END_BIT_ERR_Msk) != 0)
02260   {
02261     /* Update the Global Variable */
02262     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_DATA_ENDBIT_ERROR;
02263     /* Change the Data line to free  */
02264     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_DATA_ACTIVE;
02265     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02266     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_END_BIT_ERR_Msk;
02267     /* Release the Semaphore */
02268     Status = osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId);
02269   }
02270   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_8>>> */
02271   /* ACMD12 ERROR INTERUPT */
02272   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_ACMD_ERR_Msk) != 0)
02273   {
02274     /* Update the Global Variable */
02275     SDMMC004_Handle.AcmdInterruptError = SDMMC004_ACMD12_ERROR;
02276     /* Change the Cmd line to free  */
02277     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_CMD_ACTIVE;
02278     /* Change the Data line to free  */
02279     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_DATA_ACTIVE;
02280     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02281     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_ACMD_ERR_Msk;
02282     /* Release the Semaphore */
02283     Status = osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId);
02284   }
02285   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
02286   return Status;
02287 }
02288 
02289 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_30>>> */
02290 /*
02291  * This function is use to switch the card state to transferring state if the
02292  * card is not in the transferring state.
02293  */
02294 
02295 status_t SDMMC004_lSwitchToTransferState()
02296 {
02297   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
02298   uint32_t Argument = 0;
02299   uint32_t CardStatus = 0UL;
02300   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
02301   /* Check the current state of the card */
02302   do
02303   { 
02304     Argument |= SDMMC004_CardInfo.Rca << SDMMC004_ARG_RCA_BITPOS;
02305     /* Send Cmd13 to read card status  */
02306     Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(13)),Argument, \
02307         SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1,&CardStatus);
02308     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_30_1>>> */
02309     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02310     {
02311       break;
02312     }
02313     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_30_2>>> */
02314     /* Check if it is in transferring state */
02315     if( (( CardStatus & SDMMC004_CSR_CURRENT_STATE_BITMASK) >>\
02316            SDMMC004_CSR_CURRENT_STATE_BITPOS ) ==  \
02317            SDMMC004_CSR_CURRENT_STATE_TRANS_VALUE )
02318     {
02319 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02320       if ( Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_TransferStateError == TRUE)
02321       {
02322         /* Toggle to the Standy state.*/
02323         Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(7)),Argument, \
02324             SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1b, &CardStatus);
02325         break;
02326       }
02327 #endif
02328       Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
02329       break;
02330     }
02331     /* Switch to transfer state i.e. CMD7 */
02332     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_30_3>>> */
02333     Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(7)),Argument, \
02334         SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1b, &CardStatus);
02335   } while(0);
02336   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
02337   return Status;
02338 }
02339 
02340 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_31>>> */
02341 /*
02342  * This function performs the data transfer to/from the card .
02343  */
02344 status_t SDMMC004_lDataTransfer()
02345 {
02346   status_t Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
02347   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
02348   do
02349   {
02350 
02351     /* Block on Buffer Read/Write Ready Interrupt */
02352     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_31_1>>> */
02353     SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreIndex =osSemaphoreWait ( SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId,\
02354                                                 SDMMC004_RESET_In_DATA_TRANSFER);
02355     if( SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreIndex < 0)
02356     { 
02357       break;
02358     }
02359     /* Check Buffer is ready */
02360     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_31_2>>> */
02361     if (SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError != SDMMC004_BUFFER_READY)
02362     {
02363       SDMMC004_Handle.IssueAbort = 1;
02364       Status = SDMMC004_lErrorInterruptRecovery( \
02365                                     SDMMC004_ISRContext.InterruptStatusShadow,\
02366                                     SDMMC004_Handle.IssueAbort);
02367                                     }
02368   } while(0);
02369   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
02370   return Status;
02371 }
02372 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_43>>> */
02373 /*
02374  * This function checks the PCMD flag.
02375  */
02376 void SDMMC004_CheckPCMDFlag(status_t PCMDFlag)
02377 {
02378   SDMMC004_ReturnStatus  = 1UL;
02379   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_43_1>>> */
02380   if (PCMDFlag == 1)
02381   {
02382     ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_ACMD_BOTH_ERROR,0,0);
02383   }
02384   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_43_2>>> */
02385   else
02386   {
02387     ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_ACMD_SD_TRANSFER_ERROR,0,0);
02388   }
02389 }
02390 
02391 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32>>> */
02392 /*
02393  * This function performs the ACMD error Recovery.
02394  */
02395 void SDMMC004_lAcmdErrorRecovery()
02396 {
02397   status_t Status;
02398   status_t PCMDFlag = 0;
02399   uint32_t CardStatus = 0;
02400   do
02401   {
02402     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_1>>> */
02404     if ( ((SDMMC->ACMD_ERR_STATUS & SDMMC_ACMD_ERR_STATUS_ACMD12_NOT_EXEC_ERR_Msk) >> \
02405            SDMMC_ACMD_ERR_STATUS_ACMD12_NOT_EXEC_ERR_Pos)  == 1 )
02406     {
02407       /* Set PCMDFlag to 1*/
02408       PCMDFlag = 1;
02409       /* Check Return Status of Recovery function of CMD_wo_DAT command */
02410       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_2>>> */
02411       if (SDMMC004_Handle.ErrorRecoveryStatus != SDMMC004_RECOVERABLE_ERROR)
02412       {
02413         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_NONRECOVERABLE_ERROR,0,0);
02414         break;
02415       }
02416       /* For recoverable error, issue CMD12 */
02417       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(12)), \
02418                                       SDMMC004_ARGUMENT0, SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1,
02419                                       &CardStatus);
02420       /* No Error */
02421       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_3>>> */
02422       if (Status == (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02423       {
02424         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_ACMD_CMD_wo_DAT_ERROR,0,0);
02425         break;
02426       }
02427       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_4>>> */
02428       /* Non Recoverable Error */
02429       if (Status == (uint32_t)SDMMC004_NONRECOVERABLE_ERROR)
02430       {
02431         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status,0,0);
02432         break;
02433       }
02434     }
02435     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_5>>> */
02436     else
02437     {
02438       /* Set software reset for CMD line */
02439       Status = SDMMC004_lReset(SDMMC_SW_RESET_SW_RST_CMD_LINE_Msk);
02440       if ( Status !=(uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02441       {
02442         break;
02443       }
02444       /* Issue Cmd 12*/
02445       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_6>>> */
02446       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand(  &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(12)), \
02447                                        SDMMC004_ARGUMENT0, SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1, \
02448                                        &CardStatus);
02449       /* Non Recoverable Error */
02450       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_7>>> */
02451       if (Status == (uint32_t)SDMMC004_NONRECOVERABLE_ERROR)
02452       {
02453         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status,0,0);
02454         break;
02455       }
02456     }
02457     /*Set Software Reset for  Data line*/
02458     Status = SDMMC004_lReset(SDMMC_SW_RESET_SW_RST_DAT_LINE_Msk);
02459     if ( Status !=(uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02460     {
02461       break;
02462     }
02463     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_8>>> */
02464     /*Check Command Not issued by Auto CMD12 Error */
02465     if ( ((SDMMC->ACMD_ERR_STATUS & \
02466            SDMMC_ACMD_ERR_STATUS_CMD_NOT_ISSUED_BY_ACMD12_ERR_Msk) >> \
02467            SDMMC_ACMD_ERR_STATUS_CMD_NOT_ISSUED_BY_ACMD12_ERR_Pos) == 1)
02468     {
02469       ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_ACMD_CMD_wo_DAT_NOT_ISSUED,0,0);
02470     }
02471     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_9>>> */
02472     else
02473     {
02474       /* Check PCMD flag.If 1 means that An error occurred in CMD_wo_DAT,
02475        *  and also occurred in the SD memory transfer */
02476       SDMMC004_CheckPCMDFlag(PCMDFlag);
02477     }
02478   } while(0);
02479 }
02480 
02481 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_33 >>> */
02485 void SDMMC004_lDelay(uint32_t DelayTime)
02486 {
02487   osDelay(DelayTime);
02488 }
02489 
02490 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_34 >>>
02491  *  SDMMC Interrupt Handler */
02492 void SDMMC0_0_IRQHandler()
02493 {
02494   uint32_t Status;
02495   NormalIntStatus = SDMMC->INT_STATUS_NORM;
02496   ErrorIntStatus  = SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR;
02497   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_34_1 >>> */
02498   if (NormalIntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_NORM_ERR_INT_Msk)
02499   {
02500     Status = SDMMC004_lErrorInterruptHandler( ErrorIntStatus );
02501     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02502     {
02503       ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status,0,0);
02504     }
02505   }
02506   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_34_2 >>> */
02507   if(NormalIntStatus & SDMMC004_NORMAL_INT_STATUS_BITS)
02508   {
02509     Status = SDMMC004_lNormalInterruptHandler( NormalIntStatus);
02510     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02511     {
02512       ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status,0,0);
02513     }
02514   }
02515 }
02516 
02517 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_35 >>> */
02518 status_t SDMMC004_lCreateOSResources()
02519 {
02520   status_t Status = (uint32_t) DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
02521   do
02522   {
02523     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_35_1 >>> */
02524     if(SDMMC004_Handle.OSResourcesCreated == 0)
02525     {
02526       /* Create Data & Command Mutex */
02527       SDMMC004_CmdMutexId = osMutexCreate (osMutex(CmdMutexHandle));
02528       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_CmdMutexId ))
02529       {
02530         Status =  (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02531         break;
02532       }
02533       SDMMC004_DataMutexId = osMutexCreate(osMutex(DataMutexHandle));
02534       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_DataMutexId ))
02535       { 
02536         Status =  (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02537         break;
02538       }
02539       /* Create Data & Command Semaphore */
02540       SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId = osSemaphoreCreate (osSemaphore(CmdSemaphore), 1); 
02541       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId))
02542       { 
02543         Status =  (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02544         break;
02545       }
02546       SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId = osSemaphoreCreate (osSemaphore(DataSemaphore), 1);
02547       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId))
02548       { 
02549         Status = (uint32_t) SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02550         break;
02551       } 
02552       SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreId= osSemaphoreCreate (osSemaphore(TransferSemaphore), 1);
02553       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreId))
02554       {
02555         Status = (uint32_t) SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02556         break;
02557       }
02558       /* Take the semaphores  */
02559       SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreIndex = osSemaphoreWait(SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId,\
02560                                     SDMMC004_SEMAPHORE_BLK_TIME);
02561       if( SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreIndex < 0)
02562       {
02563         Status =  (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL; 
02564         break;
02565       } 
02566       SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreIndex =osSemaphoreWait (SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId,\
02567                                                  SDMMC004_SEMAPHORE_BLK_TIME);
02568       if( SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreIndex < 0)
02569       {
02570         Status = (uint32_t) SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02571         break;
02572       }
02573       SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreIndex =osSemaphoreWait (\
02574                                                 SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreId,\
02575                                                 osWaitForever );
02576       if( SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreIndex < 0)
02577       {
02578         Status = (uint32_t) SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02579         break;
02580       }
02581       SDMMC004_Handle.OSResourcesCreated = 1;
02582     }
02583   } while(0);
02584   return Status;
02585 }
02586 
02587 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36 >>> */
02588 /*
02589  * This function performs the card initialization and identification operation.
02590  */
02591 status_t SDMMC004_lCardIdentificationProcess()
02592 {
02593   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
02594   /* Silicon Testing Added */
02595   do
02596   {
02597     /* Confirm the Internal clock gets Stable before setting the SD clock. */
02598     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36_1 >>> */
02599     if ( !(SDMMC->CLOCK_CTRL & SDMMC_CLOCK_CTRL_INTERNAL_CLOCK_STABLE_Msk))
02600     {
02601       break;
02602     }
02603     /* Enable the SD clock */
02604     SDMMC->CLOCK_CTRL |= SDMMC_CLOCK_CTRL_SDCLOCK_EN_Msk;
02605     /* Set Power Control Register */
02606     SET_BIT( SDMMC->POWER_CTRL, SDMMC_POWER_CTRL_SD_BUS_POWER_Pos);
02607     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36_2 >>> */
02608     if(SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag == 0)
02609     {
02610       Status  = SDMMC004_lInitializeCard();
02611       /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36_3 >>> */
02612       if( Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS )
02613       {
02614         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status, 0, NULL);
02615         break;
02616       }/* End of " if( Status != DAVEApp_SUCCESS )"*/
02617       Status = SDMMC004_lAfterCardInitialize();
02618       /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36_4 >>> */
02619       if( Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS )
02620       {
02621         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status, 0, NULL);
02622         break;
02623       }/* End of "if(Status != DAVEApp_SUCCESS )" */
02624     }/* End of "if((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_CARD_INITIALIZED)
02625                    == 0 )"*/
02626   } while(0);
02627   return Status;
02628 }
02629 
02630 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_39 >>> */
02634 status_t SDMMC004_lCheckSectorBound(uint32_t SectorNumberParam, \
02635                                     uint32_t SectorCountParam)
02636 {
02637   status_t Status;
02638   uint32_t SectorCount = 0;
02639   do
02640   {
02641     /* Get Sector Count function   */
02642     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_39_1 >>> */
02643     Status = SDMMC004_GetSectorCount((void *)&SectorCount);
02644     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02645     {
02646       break;
02647     }
02648     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_39_2 >>> */
02649     /* Check the Sector Count limit */
02650     if((SectorNumberParam + SectorCountParam) >= SectorCount)
02651     {
02652       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_SECTOR_OUT_OF_BOUND;
02653     }
02654   } while(0);
02655   return Status;
02656 }
02657 
02658 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40 >>> */
02659 /*
02660  * The function performs the actual erase operation.
02661  */
02662 status_t SDMMC004_lLocalErase
02663 (
02664   uint32_t StartAddr,
02665   uint32_t EndAddr,
02666   uint32_t TimeoutVal
02667 )
02668 {
02669   /* Stores the response received  */
02670   uint32_t CardStatus = 0;
02671   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
02672   do
02673   {
02674     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_1>>> */
02675     if ((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_BLOCK_ADDRESSING) == 0UL)
02676     {
02677       StartAddr *= 512UL;
02678       EndAddr *=  512UL;
02679     }/*End of "if((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_BLOCK_ADDRESSING) == 0UL)" */
02680     /* MMC Card */
02681 #if SDMMC_SUPPORT_MMC_CARD
02682     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_2>>> */
02683     if ((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_MMC) != 0 )
02684     {
02685       /* Erase Start Command */
02686 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02687       if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseStartError == TRUE)
02688       {
02689         /* Forcefully trigger the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02690         /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
02691         SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02692         /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
02693         SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
02694       }
02695 #endif
02696       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_MMC_COMMAND(35)),\
02697                                       StartAddr, RESPONSE_R1, &CardStatus );
02698       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_3>>> */
02699       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02700       {
02701         break;
02702       }
02703       /* Erase End Command */
02704 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02705       if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseEndError == TRUE)
02706       {
02707         /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
02708         SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02709         /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
02710         SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
02711       }
02712 #endif
02713       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_MMC_COMMAND(36)),EndAddr, \
02714           RESPONSE_R1,&CardStatus );
02715       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_4>>> */
02716       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02717       {
02718         break;
02719       }
02720     }
02721     /* SD Card */
02722     else
02723 #endif /* SDMMC_SUPPORT_MMC_CARD */
02724     {
02725 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02726       if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseStartError == TRUE)
02727       {
02728         /* Forcefully trigger the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02729         //  SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0004 ;
02730         /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
02731         SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02732         /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
02733         SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
02734       }
02735 #endif
02736       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_5>>> */
02737       /* SD Erase Start Command */
02738       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_SD_COMMAND(32)), \
02739           StartAddr, SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1, &CardStatus);
02740       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02741       {
02742         break;
02743       } /* if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS) */
02744       /* SD Erase End Command */
02745 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02746       if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseEndError == TRUE)
02747       {
02748         /* Forcefully trigger the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02749         //   SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0004 ;
02750         /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
02751         SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02752         /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
02753         SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
02754       }
02755 #endif
02756       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_SD_COMMAND(33)),EndAddr, \
02757           SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1, &CardStatus);
02758       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_6>>> */
02759       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02760       {
02761         break;
02762       }/* End of " if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)"*/
02763     }/* End of "if SD card"*/
02764 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02765     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_DataErrorInterrupt == TRUE)
02766     {
02767       /* Disable the Transfer Complete Status Interrupt */
02768       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~(SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_TX_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02769       /* Disable the Transfer Complete Signal Interrupt */
02770       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~(SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_TX_COMPLETE_EN_Msk  );
02771     }
02772 
02773     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_TransferInterruptError == TRUE)
02774     {
02775       /* Disable the Transfer Complete Status Interrupt */
02776       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~(SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_TX_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02777       /* Disable the Transfer Complete Signal Interrupt */
02778       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~(SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_TX_COMPLETE_EN_Msk  );
02779     }
02780 #endif
02781     Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_SD_COMMAND(38)),\
02782                                     SDMMC004_ARGUMENT0, SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1b,\
02783                                     &CardStatus);
02784     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_7>>> */
02785     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02786     {
02787       break;
02788     }/* End of " if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)"*/
02789     SDMMC004_lDelay(TimeoutVal * 1000);
02790   } while(0);
02791   return Status;
02792 }
